description:
After dying due to God`s mistake, Touya is reborn in another world?!
There he meets the twin sisters, Elze and Linze, and starts his new life in another world along with the smartphone he got God to let him use in the new world.
Thanks to God`s power Touya`s a new person with increased abilities and a new talent for magic, so he uses his super convenient smartphone to help defeat beasts, create ice cream in the new world, and start enjoying his newfound life. What will happen to Touya`s life as time goes on?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aufgewacht und schon in einer anderen Welt.
目覚め, そして異世界.
